name: Portcullis (Samuel Goff)
description:
Created by a team of 3 during 2nd year of University, this is a mobile VR tower defence game, targeted at the Android platform used with Google Cardboard.

The player must defend their castle from increasingly difficult waves of enemies. 

This game won the team an award for Best Game Studio, given by Game Design Consultancy. (https://gamedesignconsultancy.co.uk/)

Credits

Samuel Goff

Ben Sturland

Suhad Ahmed
